sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_wsd_rsv_reservation</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="sn_wsd_rsv_reservation">stateCHANGESTOrejected^last_updated_source=servicenow^is_parent=false^ORreservation_subtype=multi_parent^reservation_subtype!=multi_child^NQis_parent=true^stateCHANGESTOcancelled^NQstateCHANGESTOcancelled^last_updated_source=servicenow^is_parent=false^reservation_subtype=occurrence^ORreservation_subtype=single^ORreservation_subtype=exception^source_reservation.reservation_subtype!=group_parent^EQ<item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Trigger cancel or reject notification</name> <order>200</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) { try { new WSDNotificationsService().validateAndDispatchReservationCancelOrRejectEvent(current); } catch (e) { var defaultErrorMessage = WSDUtils.formatString('Failed to trigger notification. Error: {0}', e.message); WSDLogger.error('sys_script.Trigger notifications', defaultErrorMessage, null); } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-07-29 12:49:13</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>2f2fabe5b7121010b85121d9ce11a971</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>83</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Trigger cancel or reject notification</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="">e9b477e9c3161010cc7060bf4b40dded</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">e9b477e9c3161010cc7060bf4b40dded</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_2f2fabe5b7121010b85121d9ce11a971</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-06-07 10:36:46</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2f2fabe5b7121010b85121d9ce11a971"/> </record_update>
